You guys gonna tell me maple syrup is fake too?

I hope you're joking.

Most maple syrup is just dressed up corn syrup. No restaurant serves real maple syrup.

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
15 minutes ago, Wes Thoughts said:

can I somehow learn to dismantle the fear of death to sort of get past the fear itself?

Yes, that is what all spiritual practice is ultimately about.

The fastest and easiest way is to take psychedelics. They will gently guide you into death and you will learn to love it.

Or do whatever other spiritual practice you like.

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Hoyeon Lee The ego-self is constantly looking out to get its needs met. When its needs are not met, or it seriously threatened, it reacts in a knee-jerk manner with heavy negative emotions like fear, anger, and judgment to defend its survival.

The ego being afraid to die goes even deeper than that.

Think of putting a loaded gun to your head and pulling the trigger. That is ego being afraid to die. Now try to imagine what it would take not to be afraid of that and not to resist it.

item.title: Is the Imagining deliberate, or automatic? (What is Reality)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
16 minutes ago, Shadowraix said:

@Leo Gura

All of it may have love but it is also possible for it to spread the opposite, no? That's what egos do. 

Love has no opposite. It is only through confusion that you seem to perceive an opposite to Love.

You are like a man who mistakes a rope for a snake in a dimly lit room.

When the room is fully lit, all you will see is Love.

Quote

Would God reject a loveless version of itself? That's not very loving. 

God's self acceptance is infinite.

item.title: Is the Imagining deliberate, or automatic? (What is Reality)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
45 minutes ago, Bryan Lettner said:

Thanks, sounds plausible. Certainly God, being God , has the power to chose otherwise, than only to maximize love?  And for all i know, God is maximizing pleasure at a particular locus, drawing vampirically from the environment around it.... all while cleverly disguising this as a Maximization of Love.  Certainly God is Infinite Cleverness as well?  If so, then it can probably disguise anything as anything else, without you or I ever becoming aware of it at the human level. 

God is not a fucking devil! God is Truth & Love.

You are projecting your own devilry and impurity onto God.

God has chosen what is best for ALL. Not necessarily what is best for your ego.

Quote

And this may be my own myopia again, but I've never heard a good explanation as to how prolonged torture can maximize love.  Torturing may be fun, cuz someone might love doing it... but being tortured, on the other hand, is not loved by anyone, not beyond a certain threshold anyway.

Yes, it is precisely your myopia.

Being tortured is loved by God. God's love is unlimited.

30 minutes ago, Shadowraix said:

Quite the paradox. God creates things with no love and allows it to exist for the sake of love.

There is no such thing as creation without love.

Wherever you find no love, it is because you are blind to it.

item.title: Is the Imagining deliberate, or automatic? (What is Reality)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
2 minutes ago, Bryan Lettner said:

what causes god's choice to will a particular imagining, vs. a different one?

Infinite Love

Every choice is made to maximize Love.

God is no fool. It knows exactly what its doing.

item.title: Did You Know? - Interesting Food Facts and Trivia
item.description:
in Health, Fitness, Nutrition
21 hours ago, Emerald said:

One vanilla bean, is $11 on average if you go to the spices section. Literally, just one is that expensive. And it's the size and shape of a long green bean.

So, I was wondering how vanilla ice cream doesn't cost like $30 for a pint.

In our fake culture did you really expect real vanilla beans to be used?

Most people have never even tasted a real vanilla bean. Real, fresh, raw, ground vanilla is amazing! Put it in your smoothies.

https://www.amazon.com/Wilderness-Poets-Pure-Vanilla-Powder/dp/B00ELNQ632/

item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@lostmedstudent Love for Truth, Self, Reality, and others.

Think of a time when you loved someone or something deeply. Now expand the object of that love to the whole universe. See the beauty of everything that exists.

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
2 minutes ago, Peo said:

Just wonder how many times do i have to watch the video about "What is reality" before i understand what is being said and i have a psychotic break? I just want taste the fear again. You could say im chasing my own death, but maybe i will just run away once i get there. 

You can watch that video 1000 times and you will be no closer to understanding it.

You must CHANGE YOUR STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS. A video cannot do that. Do the practices.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
4 minutes ago, LoveandPurpose said:

@Leo Gura Yes but how is it from the relative standpoint? I'm just curious. (aND SCARED PLEASE)

From the relative standpoint you believe that others can harm you and you suffer deeply when you don't get your way.

The solution to fear is love, not more fear.

What do you tell a child who is deathly afraid of the dark?

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
3 minutes ago, lostmedstudent said:

i am just afraid to develop some sort of PTSD or psychosis and end up functioning worse than I am right now in life.

Yes, you are stuck in fear. Notice that.

The solution to fear is love.

There's no rush. You can stay stuck in fear for as long as you want until you grow tired of it and decide to try love instead.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@LoveandPurpose You are the only entity in existence. That is what you must awaken to.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@LoveandPurpose All realms disappear if you become conscious enough. At the highest levels of consciousness there will only be pure white light.

Quote

And one question: Does someone get sent to those realms or is it just that they are in a very bad state of mind and therefore imagine them?

Again, what is the difference?

God does not punish you, if that's what you mean. God does not send you to hell. You send yourself to hell by your own ignorance. God has nothing but Absolute Love for you.

God loves you so much that it will allow you to imagine your own hell and experience it. God will never take that freedom away from you. God's greatest desire is that you realize the power of your own mind. So you can see how big you are. You cannot realize your bigness if you deny hell. God will never deny anything to you.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Anton_Pierre There can be no higher guru than oneself.

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@lostmedstudent No

There is never a comfortable and convenient way of facing death. You will never be "ready" for it. You must face it and deal with whatever arises. It doesn't have to be so difficult.

It's like you're being told to jump into a cold pool and you keep saying, "But maybe I should go do X before I jump in. Maybe I'm not ready for the cold." It' will always be cold. You cannot avoid that.

On my 24 birthday I went skydiving. I had to jump out of a fucking moving airplane at 12,000 ft. How did I do it? I just jumped. It was not pleasant. But I also didn't spend a lot of time thinking about it otherwise it would have been a lot worse.

Jumping out of an airplane is scarier than ego death on a psychedelic.

item.title: Is the Imagining deliberate, or automatic? (What is Reality)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

God is Infinite Will. 

But the human ego is not conscious it.

Human will is a tiny fraction of God's Infinite Will, which is why you as a human cannot will yourself to be a kangaroo. But you can perform more minor miracles like deciding to eat some pizza.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
24 minutes ago, Matteo said:

@Leo Gura I think what you're saying makes sense. I would like to interview one of those extrasensory people to know how they developed their opinion on the subject. Have you done such a thing? Have you had any occasion of meeting with an extrasensory person and have him check your body's condition? Are you interested in having this kind of feedback?

The difficulty with that is how are you/they going to distinguish body conditions which were caused by psychedelics vs other things?

I have many conditions which existed long before I did psychedelics. Sorting that out will get very tricky because the extrasensory person will not have intimate knowledge of my biology or life history. For example, I've struggled low energy problems for most of my adult life, a decade before I discovered psychedelics. But an extrasensory person might be tempted to blame it on using psychedelics, which would be a gross error.

In the end no one can know you better than you can know yourself. So if you really want to understand you must run your own experiments, not ask some stranger for answers. Any other you ask for answers is 1 step removed from your own direct experience and hence will always be less credible than your own direct experience.

item.title: The N,N-DMT Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
15 minutes ago, Galyna said:

Leo, I want to make sure I don’t see any creatures, it will freak me till the rest of my life.

That attitude is not going to cut it. That is an attitude of fear.

You need to have an attitude of: "I want the truth and whatever the truth is, I will love and accept it."

Your attitude must be one of Truth & Love. Love for self, love for others, love for the world. Everything you fear and hate you must learn to love and see the beauty and value of.

Whatever you fear, the psychedelics will definitely make you face it head-on, if not in this trip then in the next. You cannot access God consciousness so long as you have fear of creatures or anything else. First you will have to purify yourself of all fear. Because God is pure Love! You cannot access God's infinite Love so long as there are parts of the universe that you hate or reject.

There is nothing in the universe to hate or fear because the entire universe is yourself. But this requires enormous emotional maturity to embody. This is where the real inner growth happens.

Imagine seeing your worst nightmare and loving it. That is the proper attitude. This is the whole point of all of our work. To become unconditionally loving. It's not easy to do for humans. But then again, that's why you're on this Earth in the first place: to learn to love. Earth is a love simulator.

item.title: "What is reality" epiphany terror realization
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

That's exactly right. I know exactly what you're talking about. That's the ego's natural reaction to going directly for enlightenment. It's terrified of the unknown infinitude. Only natural and totally expected.

The solution is to push through it, face the fear head-on, until you breakthrough to the other side. This can take many attempts.

This is why religions call it "taking the leap of faith". You place your faith in Truth as your highest aim and desire, and blindly leap for it not knowing what will happen. From your POV it feels like you will die. But your love for Truth must be so great that you desire it so much that you are willing to die to have it. And so you do. But in reality what will happen is the ego will collapse and you will land in an infinitely deep pool of the softest down feathers. That is paradise, heaven, nirvana, -- AKA, the Love of God.

But you cannot know this before you take the leap.

Fear of death & insanity is what keeps you from entering the Kingdom of Heaven.

But of course, you must realize, all fear is imaginary. You are like the groundhog terrified of its own shadow.

Psychedelics make ego-death a lot easier.

item.title: The N,N-DMT Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Galyna Indeed, it's utterly shockingly interactive.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms

@Leo Gura Illusions in the grander scale that everything is God or in the sense that it's only a projection of the mind and isn't really real?

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
7 minutes ago, Matteo said:

So, even though those people have no experience themselves, aren't their capacities giving some validity to their perspective?

That is a fair point, IF TRUE. But that's a big IF.

There's a big difference between an extrasensory person actually looking at you after you've consumed psychedelics and telling you that they see something wrong in your body, versus them just making a generic proclamation that all psychedelics are energetically harmful.

The first case is a direct observation of a specific person and situation. The second case is a theoretical abstraction which can come from a biased, closedminded, sloppy, bigoted perspective.

It's the difference between saying: I was once robbed by a black guy versus saying all black guys are thieves. Very important difference!

The essence of bigotry is making overly broad claims about things which one has little to no experience of.

item.title: The N,N-DMT Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
On 6/28/2019 at 5:28 AM, pluto said:

3g Syrian rue tea will enhance and prolong the pure DMT when consumed 30 - 45 minutes beforehand. Boil for 5 - 9 minutes then strain and drink. You might want to add generous amount of raw honey or other natural sweetener as it very strong stuff. You can also add extra herbal infusions they use to make (changa) like passionflower, lemon balm, chamomile ect.. for they should potentially enhance/prolong the effect and support the nervous system.

A good dose of cacao beforehand should most definitely be a solid potentiator as it has been used with mushrooms by many ancient cultures to enhance and nourish with brain and body with adequate nutrients and chemicals to support an optimal experience. Although i would be wary to combine with syrian rue due so best keep those two separate.

I have personally experienced low-dose psychedelic effects from mega dosing cacao alone, also known as "ceremonial dosing" but i would do this alone and not mix with stronger psychedelics. If i wanted to enhance other psychedelics, i would consume anywhere between 7 - 21 grams of raw cacao paste sometime beforehand.

One step at a time, start small, find your sweet spots and take note of your nervous system because frequent psychoactive use tends to severely overstimulate it and with an overstimulated central nervous system, its near impossible to be fully present and embody an enlightened awareness until a long break from any form(chemical and or technological) of over-stimulation is provided.

Careful folks, consuming Syrian Rue requires being on a special MAOI diet, otherwise it can be physically dangerous.

Also, you can buy pure Harmala extract on Ebay. No need to mess with the Syrian Rue seeds. Harmala is a legal herb.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
35 minutes ago, ValiantSalvatore said:

@Leo Gura What was the highest dose you have taken with LSD or any other derivate , since you say that you are very sensitve and don't need that much ? I was curious because in the new video you talked about seeing your hand full with eyes and imagining them and it became real. Was this on LSD or another substance ?

I have not done high doses of LSD. 125ug is plenty for me to have a very deep trip. Of course I could always double or triple it.

But 125ug of LSD enough for me to start seeing eyes in my couch pillow. It's a subtle effect. They are not full-blown eyes. But at higher doses they definitely will be. Mushrooms also work the same way for me. I tend to see eyes and other weird patterns on mushrooms.

Here's what I mean:

  • https://psychonautwiki.org/wiki/File:Face_within_tree_bark.jpg
  • https://psychonautwiki.org/wiki/File:Skullflower.jpg

 

Quote

I tripped approx. 15-20 times now, but the enviroment was semi-optimal. Yet, I have a new idea where I could try it, so I was curious and I don't want to go overboard. Either that or 5-MeO DMT...

Most people will probably need more than 125ug of LSD to start seeing eyes and things.

in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Matteo Before you take someone's opinions on psychedelics seriously, ask them how many times they have done psychedelics and in what environment.

Then dimiss the opinions of everyone who has done fewer than 50 trips, since they have insufficient experience to speak about psychedelics.

If you take the opinions of people with zero psychedelic experience seriously, you will come to erronious conclusions.

item.title: What Is Reality? What is Energy?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Imagination has many levels of depth to it.

The walls of your house are imaginary, but this is a degree of imagination which is beyond your typical human purview.

In other words, you as God are imagining (at very deep levels), that the walls of your house are not imaginary but real. In this way God creates physics.

If you chnage your state of consciousness you will see that those physical walls were actually imaginary all along.

item.title: Addressing Leo's recent video on higher states of consciousness.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
2 hours ago, Mafortu said:

Hi Leo

Does this all mean that the past and the future are not real?

They are as real anything else, since imagination IS reality.

Quote

Before yesterday's video I thought everything was "information", and as such, past and future events are eternally stored somewhere.

Where is imaginary. Everywhere is nowhen.

Reality is: nowhere, nowhen, nohow, nothing, noone.

2 hours ago, Galyna said:

@Leo Gura

Do you think the death of the “hero” (which is me, in this so-called imaginary reality) is a similar state of the consciousness when I fall asleep? Every day I go to bed and fall asleep. But the peculiar thing is that I am not conscious of that shift. Sometimes, very rarely, before I fall asleep, I have a sensation like I am falling from the cliff down, other times I hear the nonsense talk in my mind, like meaningless words or sentences. And then I go absolutely unconscious till wake up in the morning and starting to remember me, as Galyna, again, with all my life story. I truly want to understand how this so-called imagination with the name Galyna, will cease to exist, and consciousness starts imagining you, for example. How will this shift happen? Is it going to be the same as going to sleep? I fall asleep as Galyna and wake up as a baby Leo? Do you think it is the way consciousness shifts between various imaginations? Also, I feel pain grasping this, because I think of it within the linear time frame, for instance, consciousness started to imagine Mark-Bella-Galyna-Leo.

Is there any plausible explanation so I can imagine this better?  

It's not really possible to explain. You need to experience nondual consciousness. Then things will clear up.

I recommend trying a psychedelic which will help you to understand this stuff.

It's more radical and twisted than you presently imagine.

Sleep is not consciousness. Awakening is the opposite of sleep.

So how do I raise my level of consciousness? Or will I be going up and down for the rest of my life?

item.title: Transcendence vs Integration
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Definitely this is the biggest challenge of the path: embodying it deeply in everyday life. This is especially difficult with psychedelics because they take you so high so fast, no one can live from those places of infinite consciousness and still interact in the social world.

At high doses of psychedelics you are not a human any more. It is like venturing to new alien dimensions.

This is why a binary classification scheme for awakening is so problematic. It hides so many other aspects of growth and understanding.

item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Enlightenment You're not appreciating how deep imagination goes. It is literally infinite and it is God. You think an infinite mind cannot simultaneously imagine a trillion lives and sync them all up to each other? Programmers easily do that for millions of people in modern online videos games using piddly finite silicon computers.

Quantum waves are something you imagine.

The ONLY way a thing can exist is if it is held in your consciousness.

Not just a mental construct but Infinite Consciousness.

You're not understanding just how radical INFINITE is! It has infinite power and zero limits.

item.title: The DPT Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Psychonaut It is not going to make sense from your current state of consciousness that your dog is imaginary.

What's needed is not a belief that he was imaginary but a change in your state of consciousness.

Also don't forget that imagination is reality. So your dog is real: as real as anything else can be.

When everything is a dream, all dreamed up creations have a reality of their own.

in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

You are God. God is eternal infinite consciousness.

So what is the issue here?

item.title: Can Leo do anything demonstrable "superhuman" and going foreward for actualize.org
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Corpus Don't confuse Absolute Truth with my various explanations of things. All of my explanations are of course limited, biased, relative, and sometimes fallible.

None of that is the Absolute.

I am a fallible human and I sometimes make intellectual mistakes. But that does not change the Absolute one bit. The Absolute does not hinge on anything I say or any mistake I make. I could become a lying mass murdering con-man, but the Absolute will still be the Absolute.

item.title: Can Leo do anything demonstrable "superhuman" and going foreward for actualize.org
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
6 minutes ago, Enlightenment said:

@Leo Gura IMO when you close your mind to the possibility of being wrong in a sense that there is nothing that can ever change your mind - it becomes problematic, it's like talking to a dogmatic religious person

Absolute Truth is beyond an open or closed mind. It is absolute.

You need to be wise enough to forsee that, otherwise you'll be compromising with ignorance.

The Absolute cannot be "wrong" because wrong is a duality.

God cannot be wrong nor can it be doubted.

It sounds religious because it is GOD! What do you want me to do? Deny God to please your egoic standards?

No, that will not happen. Truth does not comprise with falsehood. If you can't accept that, it's actually because your mind is closed.

You need to be open to the possibility of closing your mind when it comes to doubting God. What you are closing your mind to is falsehood. Which is proper.

item.title: Enlightenment?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Original11 There are many levels of depth to awakening.

It sounds like you've had some taste of awakening but it also sounds like you've got much deeper to go.

So good job, but also keep going deeper.

item.title: Why Are The So Called "Spiritual People" So Full Of Shit?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

I wouldn't worry too much about New Agers and hippies. They are actually one of the most evolved segments of our society. Of course they are not Buddhas, but you should be more worried about the rednecks.

We need MORE New Agers and hippies, not to ridicule them.

One of my critiques of JP Sears channel is that in ridiculing New Agers he ends up making stage Orange people feel superior when they are in fact less evolved than the people they are laughing at. Most viewers on YT do not understand that they are ridiculing hippies from below, not above!

Ridicule of stage Green is becoming a favorite business model on YT, and it's very harmful to the evolution of society because millions of ignorant people get the idea that stage Green is bad, moronic, impractical, deluded, unworkable, etc. This is like having a Youtube channel which makes fun of reading books.

item.title: Why Are The So Called "Spiritual People" So Full Of Shit?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
4 minutes ago, Shiva said:

If it's the devil's last attempt, does this mean that these people are in fact close to actual awakening?

As you know, many of those New Agers and Hippies tend to be stage Green. Which makes them much more evolved and conscious than the average person. So are they closer to awakening? Sure, but most of them are still very far.

It's easier to awaken a hippie than a redneck.

item.title: Why Are The So Called "Spiritual People" So Full Of Shit?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Shiva Precisely because those spiritual games are the devil's last attempt to save himself from total annihilation.

The devil's favorite defense mechanism is distraction and corruption of the highest truth. If the devil can de-fang a spiritual teaching by turning it into a New Age fad, that's ideal for his purposes!

How easy would enlightenment be if all spiritual teachings led directly to God? Too easy! The devil's gotta muddy those waters to hell so no one finds the Truth.

Direct spiritual teachings are too hardcore for most people. So they need to be watered down for mainstream audiences, but in doing so they become completely ineffective and even counter-productive.

And, BTW, making fun of and judging pseudo-woke spiritual New Agers is itself a distraction

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Freakrik No one can get stuck in hell forever because all form is temporary. As the Buddhists like to point out.

If you go to a hell realm eventually you will wake up. All formed realms are like dreams. They last some while and then God wakes up. The devil will never defeat God. All of the devil's victories are temporary.

Pain is imaginary, as are all realms.

item.title: Can Leo do anything demonstrable "superhuman" and going foreward for actualize.org
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@FrankTheTank I understand it looks that way from your POV, but you do not yet understand how radical Absolute Truth is. It cannot be doubted.

The end result of openmindedness is Absolute Truth, at which point you are beyond the mind entirely and you are never going back nor will you ever compromise with ignorance.

Don't mistake openmindedness for compromise with ignorance. Not all positions warrant serious consideration. Once you taste nonduality you will never take dualistic positions seriously again.

item.title: scared of spirituality - can you not be ready for it?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
8 minutes ago, LoveandPurpose said:

After self-help, how do I know that I am (more) ready for the Truth so I can focus again on spirituality? 

There is no formula for it. You push as hard as you can until you can't go further.

It's sort of like you're asking: How do I know how many miles I can run before I am too tired to run any more?

Go do it and see where your limit is. Then train some more and your limit will rise.

There are many aspects of your life you could work on developing if you don't feel ready for the Fully Monty yet. Go work on your career/life purpose or your relationships or your diet or your self-esteem. All of that is good stuff.

item.title: 10 Day 1st Retreat Report and Questions
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Regardless of your results, that was a very powerful step in your journey.

Congrats for doing it! Anyone who completes a 10-day solo retreat has my respect. It's one of the hardest things in the world.

To get serious results on retreats though you should be meditating/concentrating 10-12 hours per day. It takes enormous effort.

P.S. Next time, double the volume of your microphone. Very hard to hear it.

item.title: scared of spirituality - can you not be ready for it?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@LoveandPurpose Yes, you could not be ready for going that deep yet. In which case focus on basic self-help.

Then again, when will you ever be ready? No one is ever ready for the Truth. It skull-fucks you either way. Because reality is a grand thing. It ain't no small thing to create the entire universe from scratch.

The funny thing is, all fear is illusion. Fear is literally nothing! Since you are immortal.

You are like the groundhog who saw his own shadow and ran away in fear. After you awaken you will laugh and laugh at how silly you were.

item.title: The Founder Of Israel Was Spiral Dynamic Stage Yellow- Read Some Amazing Facts!
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
6 hours ago, Nivsch said:

What do you mean Leo can you explain?

Einstein was politically very progressive & liberal. He saw the Nazi threat very early before any of his colleagues did. He fled Nazi Germany long before the war started and he spoke out against the dangers of nationalism. After the war there was a movement to create Israel. Some top Jewish leaders tried to recruit Einstein to their cause. But Einstein was too conscious for that. He saw that the Jews are embarking along a similar path as the Nazi's with their own flavor of Jewish nationalism (Zionism). He warned about these dangers.

And today we see that this is the case. Far right-wing Jewish nationalists are dedicated to oppressing the Palestinian people in their quest for a pure Zion.

It's ironic that those Jews never learned the true lesson of Nazi Germany. The lesson was NOT that Jews need their own homeland. The lesson was that nationalism of any stripe is unconscious and destructive to minorities.

Einstein understood all this. Netanyahu, Evangelicals, and their supporters do not. This is the difference between Spiral Dynamics stage Blue & Green. Orthodox Jews are Blue. Einstein was Green.

To be fair, there are many stage Green progressive Jews in Israel and the US. But just like in the US, demagogues like Trump tend to drown out the voices of reason, consciousness, love, and moderation.

The big picture is this: all limited identities create problems. Just to think of oneself as a "Jew" is already a problem because it is untrue. No one is actually a Jew, they merely imagine they are. They have constructed an identity out of it. Because this identity is fundamentally false, it must be defended to the death and truth must be suppressed. Right wing nationalist Jew like Netanyahu and his ilk are busy defending an false identity, which is why they can be so vicious. This is the fundamental problem with all forms of nationalism. Your true identity is oneness with all living beings. You are God imagining he is a Jew.

item.title: Alone on my path
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
1 hour ago, Scarecrow said:

No one wants to help you or guide you to find the answers that the world that raised you haven't answered.

It's not that no one wants to help you. It's that no one can help you find Absolute Truth because Absolute Truth is singular.

YOU ARE THE TRUTH! Only you. There is no one else there.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
50 minutes ago, Rinne said:

@Leo Gura Do you think as a human being we could only tap into so much imagination? Would you say that one would have to die to get full access to the full power of imagination? 

I think there are serious limits for human beings, yes.

I have yet to see a guru sprout wings and fly off into the sunset. Until I see that, I will assume there are serious limits.

But there are no limits for God proper. Since of course God invented all the birds.

This problem arises simply due to a natural conflict of being a thing. To be a thing one must be that thing to the exclusion of other things. To be a human means that you are not a bird, and vice versa. The mistake people make is that they overlook the self-imposed limits of God's design. If God decides to create a dog, you cannot then say, "But why can't God also give it wings?" Because a dog is not supposed to have wings! Such thinking is the ego-mind's silly fantasies. The dog is God, but that does not mean that a dog has the power to grow wings at will. Even though God does have that power. A dog is God in a very specific, limited form, so it is bounded by that form. If God wishes to be unbounded, then it will cease being a dog. But then you will not be able to see it or interact with it in any way. Interaction requires form requires limitation.

The reason the Godhead is so hard to find is because it is everywhere and nowhere. So you cannot pinpoint it.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
2 minutes ago, Anton_Pierre said:

@Leo Gura No that wasn't concept and imagination, that was anahata realm. He knew I didn't have clear enough discernment and sweet enough emotion. 

There is no distinction between any realms and imagination.

I am not just talking about concept. I mean that all physical objects are also imagination, just a deeper level of it. Levels you are not conscious of yet.

The problem is that you are not yet conscious of how you imagine physical objects. But you do.

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
1 hour ago, Anton_Pierre said:

@Leo Gura I don't agree, I literally saw him come up to me, flick his whiskers and drop me back down so he's up in the heavens constantly, teaching us how to get up there properly.

Right, you are imagining that right now.

21 minutes ago, Speedscarlet said:

@Leo Gura But it is true that many muslims become enlightened by practicing devotion towards Muhammad so much, and they build so much love and respect for the prophet, until they achieve a state of merging with the prophet called ‘Fana fi Rasool’, or annihilation with the prophet. Surely this contradicts your earlier statement that devotion can’t lead to enlightenment.

Sure that can happen.

I'm not saying devotion cannot lead to enlightenment. I'm saying it's a very problematic path in practice.

How many Muslims are deluded more than enlightened? 99.99999% of them.

The point is you can turn any object into an object of devotion. If you wanted you could buy a pet goat and imagine that it is God, make it your guru, kiss its feet 5 times a day, have sex with it, and eventually merge with it and become enlightened through it. That goat is as much God as Muhammad, Sadhguru, or anything else.

You are the one imagining this whole game. So you can create whatever spiritual path you like. If you tell yourself you need a guru, that will be true for you.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Anton_Pierre There are hell realms beyond merely suffering or being unconscious in this physical realm.

I mean literal hell realms with devils and fire and horror. The stuff of horror movies. You can dream it up. What do you think a horror movie is? Some twisted mind had to dream that shit up.

Imagine being stuck in a horror movie.

item.title: Can you guys explain Hell realms
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

You (as God) can dream up whatever realm you want.

If the mind is impure it will dream up hell realms. No different than nightmares.

Once you are conscious and pure enough you will not have nightmares any more because you will fear nothing.

item.title: what is the matrix?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Did you know the origin of the word Matrix?

Quote

Borrowed from Old French matrice (“pregnant animal”), or from Latin mātrīx (“dam, womb”), from māter (“mother”).

https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/matrix

In other words, the Mother, or Source of all Creation.

In other words, God.

In other words, YOU!

item.title: Sadhguru on psychedelics.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

You are imagining Sadhguru. Don't ever forget that.

The point of Sadhguru is to get you to realize that. Everything else is distraction.

You are also imagining psychedelics. Psychedelics do not actually exist outside of your imagination of them.

The point of taking psychedelics is to realize that you only imagined having taken them 

When you can no longer distinguish between psychedelics, fantasy, hallucination, and physical reality, then you've learned the most important lesson.

item.title: Jesus Not Human?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

The key point on this topic is this:

Everyone just assumes that Jesus was human. Notice that this is purely an assumption. There is no evidence for it. It is possible that he was not human. Which might explain a lot.

Things could be more complicated than people assume.

The point is not to have some definitive answer, but to question your own paradigms. You never know what amazing discoveries that could lead to. This is the essence of inquiry and science. You question and consider various ways of interpreting the world around you without getting dogmatic about it.
